Package UserInterface.ModelsAndRenderers

Class MapOpticsModel

java.lang.Object
UserInterface.ModelsAndRenderers.MapOpticsModel
public class MapOpticsModel extends Object
Contains data of reference and query, and their alignments.
Author:
James
